name: Slashdot - Black Background, Green Text
description:
Prettified version of style 18174 that actually works with modpoints, commenting, *and* story submission.  Works well with slashboxes. (I would've uploaded screenshots, but even the super-cropped versions were over 75KB.  Ah well.)

If you didn't already realize, I'm releasing this into the public domain.  it would be nice if you credited me for it, though, if you're going to use it.
